segments.text: Would you please weigh this letter to see what the postage is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to send it by ordinary or registered mail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A postal order for four hundred dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , you'd better have it registered .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will I be informed when my friend gets the letter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , when your friend gets it , he'll sign a receipt , which will be sent to you by mail . Then you can be sure it's been received .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , I'll have it registered , then .
segments.speaker: S1
